org.pentaho.pat.server.services
Interface QueryService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryServiceImpl
public interface QueryService
extends Service

This interface defines the operations permitted on a query object.

Author:
Luc Boudreau

Method Summary
 void clearSelection(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String sessionId, java.lang.String dimensionName, java.util.List<java.lang.String> memberNames)
          Unselects members from a dimension inside a query.

          Creates a selection of members on a given dimension.

          Executes a query.
 void moveDimension(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String sessionId, org.olap4j.Axis.Standard axis, java.lang.String dimensionName)
          Moves a dimension from an axis to another.
 

Method Detail

moveDimension

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void moveDimension(java.lang.String userId,
                           java.lang.String sessionId,
                           org.olap4j.Axis.Standard axis,
                           java.lang.String dimensionName)
Moves a dimension from an axis to another. You must first specify onto which query to perform the operation via Session.setCurrentQuery().

Parameters:
userId - The owner of the query.
sessionId - The session id into which the query is stored.
axis - The axis into which we want the dimension to be put. Null to remove it from the current query.
dimensionName - The name of the dimension to move.

createSelection

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void createSelection(java.lang.String userId,
                             java.lang.String sessionId,
                             java.lang.String dimensionName,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> memberNames,
                             org.olap4j.query.Selection.Operator selectionType)
                     throws org.olap4j.OlapException
Creates a selection of members on a given dimension. You must first specify onto which query to perform the operation via Session.setCurrentQuery().

Parameters:
userId - The owner of the query.
sessionId - The session id into which the query is stored.
dimensionName - The name of the dimension onto which to apply the selection.
memberNames - A list of member names to select.
selectionType - The type of selection to perform.
Throws:
org.olap4j.OlapException - If something goes sour.

clearSelection

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
void clearSelection(java.lang.String userId,
                            java.lang.String sessionId,
                            java.lang.String dimensionName,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> memberNames)
Unselects members from a dimension inside a query. You must first specify onto which query to perform the operation via Session.setCurrentQuery().

Parameters:
userId - The owner of the query.
sessionId - The session id into which the query is stored.
dimensionName - The name of the dimension that contains the members to deselect.
memberNames - A list of member names to deselect.

executeQuery

@Secured(value="ROLE_USER")
OlapData executeQuery(java.lang.String userId,
                              java.lang.String sessionId)
                      throws org.olap4j.OlapException
Executes a query. You must first specify onto which query to perform the operation via Session.setCurrentQuery().

Parameters:
userId - The owner of the query.
sessionId - The session id into which the query is stored.
Returns:
The resultset of the query as a OlapData object.
Throws:
org.olap4j.OlapException - If something goes sour.
